User-Item interactions augmentation prompt module

Script that defines the prompt for the user-item interactions data augmentation.

user_item_interactions.llm_user_item_interaction(user_history, candidates, llm)

function that defines the prompt for the user-item interactions data augmentation.

Parameters:

  • user_history (str) – history of books read by user

  • candidates (str) – a list of candidates books to be recommended

  • llm (LLM) – LLM model

Returns:

LLM response

Return type:

str
